about_the_game:
Moon Tower: Gotta Save the Universe Real Quick offers a journey of precision and timing. As you navigate to the universe's center, master the intricate art of platforming with each attempt.

Gameplay Overview:

Scale the heights of Moon Tower, facing diverse and challenging environments. Tackle icy terrains that test your balance, wade through treacherous quicksand, and master the gravitaion of black holes. Each environment is uniquely designed to test your adaptability and reflexes.

Async Multiplayer:

Compete asynchronously with friends, watching their scores update live in your game world, adding a layer of competition to your solo adventure.

Twitch Integration:

Transform your stream into an interactive spectacle on Twitch. Your audience can vote to assist or challenge you, influencing the game in real-time. Whether they provide boosts or playfully complicate your journey, each stream evolves into a distinct experience. Engage with your community, encourage their support, and anticipate their whimsical interventions as you jump your way up.

You can engage with Twitch votes in singleplayer by interacting with rare events.

Character Customization:

Unlock skins by playing the game or achieving specific milestones. Each skin changes your appearance and highlights your accomplishments. Your customized look, including all skins, is showcased on the leaderboards, letting you flaunt your style to your friends and other players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics, e.g., Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: High-quality DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: Reach the center of the universe while your chat votes on whether to help or hinder you in this interactive Twitch game!
